_header: How darest thou swear or be so bold also
_description: Against swearing and blaspheming Christ in the use of oaths — one stanza rhyme royal

CamTCC1157.First Lines:
How darest thow swere or be so bold alsoTo blasfeme hym that is
                    very rote and rynde…
CamTCC1157.Last Lines:
…Thow shuldest be drawe and hangyd by þe chynAs a
                    Traytour horrybill thogh þu were next of his kyn
